name: Cyborg Ninja (Gintoki1234)
description:
Cyborg Ninja is a game where you play as 'Z' , a cyborg ninja assassin. It is a short and challenging action-platformer game that will test your game skills.

The game was made for 2-button game jam where only two buttons are used for the player controls.

Use 'J' and 'K' to play the game.

J = jump, double jump and switch menu.

K = attack, confirm selection.

While holding K, press J to to do a dash attack.

Press both J and K for more than 2 seconds to pause the game and open menu.

 I did the gameplay design, the story and programming for the game. The art, SFX and music were bought by me from the following creators:

Enemy and Environment by CraftPix https://free-game-assets.itch.io/

Sword Slash VFX by Spikerman  https://spikerman.itch.io/sword-slashes

Dust VFX by Jasontomlee  https://jasontomlee.itch.io/smoke-fx

Music by Stevenmelin https://www.gamedevmarket.net/member/stevenmelin/
